name: curso-cypress
description: este es un proecto de cypress para automatizacion de pruebas de software

scripts.clean-reports: rm -rf reports report && mkdir -p reports report
scripts.test:chrome:mochawesome: npm run clean-reports && REPORT_NAME=mochawesome-$(date +%s) npx cypress run --browser chrome --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=$REPORT_NAME,overwrite=false,html=false,json=true
scripts.report:full: npm run test:chrome:mochawesome && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-report
